sentences: The workshop on emissions projections was held from 6-8 September 2004, in Bonn, and aimed to support the preparation of Annex I fourth national communications.
The workshop covered methods, assumptions, indicators, key parameters of models and sensitivity analysis, and the dissemination of methodologies for estimating emissions projections.
A workshop report will be presented to SBSTA-21.
enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
